title: Giselle
brief_description: This production of the classic ballet, “Giselle” features the American Ballet Theatre and the Orchestra Der Deutschen Oper Berlin, conducted by John Lanchbery. Presented in two acts, choreography is by David Blair, Jules Perrot and Jean Coralli.
